about.title: ABOUT ME
about.intro: ðŸ’» I'm a Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience in building modern web applications, working on the Front-end with React and TypeScript and on the Back-end with Java Spring Boot. I have solid knowledge in SQL, version control with Git, and CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.

list.item2: Focus on quality, maintainability, and developer experience (DX).
list.item3: Collaboration and clear communication in multidisciplinary teams.

about.education: Graduated in Systems Analysis and Development, I'm passionate about technology and always seeking continuous growth. I work with agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and value good development practices such as Clean Code and SOLID.

fintrak.title: Fintrak
fintrak.text: Personal finance management app with expense tracking, charts, users, and login. Built with React, TypeScript, and NestJS.

cripto.title: Crypto API
cripto.text: App that consumes a cryptocurrency API and displays a paginated, filterable table using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

portfolio.title: Portfolio V1
portfolio.text: My first personal portfolio, built early in my career and later evolved with new technologies and design.
